skill_triggers.name: Arcane
skill_triggers.effect: When you use an Aether effect and score 0 Hits, add +2 Bonus Hits to the result.

skill_triggers.name: Mystical
skill_triggers.effect: When you use an Aether effect, score +1 Bonus Hits.

skill_triggers.name: Celestial
skill_triggers.effect: When you score 3+ Hits with an Aether effect, you may have the target gain Dazed 1.

skill_triggers.name: Cosmic
skill_triggers.effect: When you score 4+ Hits with an Aether effect, you may remove 1 Hazard in the effect's Zone.

skill_triggers.name: Ethereal
skill_triggers.effect: When you use the Recover Action and score 4+ Hits, you may reduce one Status by -1.

skill_triggers.name: Otherworldly
skill_triggers.effect: When you score 3+ Hits with a Aether effect, you may have the effect's Zone lose Darkened until your next turn.

skill_triggers.name: Chimeric
skill_triggers.effect: When you score 3+ Hits with an Aether effect, you may have the target gain Charmed 1.

skill_triggers.name: Elucidating
skill_triggers.effect: When you use Cosmology, History, Insight, or Perceive and score 0 Hits, add +1d4 Bonus Hits to the result set.

skill_triggers.name: Scalar
skill_triggers.effect: When you use an Arithm effect and score 0 Hits, add +2 Bonus Hits to the result.

skill_triggers.name: x+1
skill_triggers.effect: When you use an Arithm effect, score +1 Bonus Hits.

skill_triggers.name: Calculated
skill_triggers.effect: When you score 4+ Hits with an Arithm effect, you may regain +1 Axiom.

skill_triggers.name: Formulaic
skill_triggers.effect: When you Perceive and score 3+ Hits, you may use 1 other Arithm Skill Trigger.

skill_triggers.name: Geometric
skill_triggers.effect: When you Analyze and score 3+ Hits, you may use 1 other Arithm Skill Trigger.

skill_triggers.name: Exacting
skill_triggers.effect: When you use your Insight and score 3+ Hits, you may use 1 other Arithm Skill Trigger.

skill_triggers.name: Integral
skill_triggers.effect: When you score 3+ Hits with an Arithm effect, you may increase the Challenge by +1.

skill_triggers.name: Numerical
skill_triggers.effect: When you score 3+ Hits with an Arithm effect, you may decrease the Challenge by -1.

skill_triggers.name: Differentiable
skill_triggers.effect: When you Research and score 3+ Hits, you may use 1 other Arithm Skill Trigger.

skill_triggers.name: Fierce
skill_triggers.effect: When you score 0 Hits with a Bellor effect, add +2 Bonus Hits to the result.

skill_triggers.name: Warlike
skill_triggers.effect: When you score 4+ Hits with a Bellor effect while the Entropy is 10+, add +1d4 Bonus Hits to the result set.

skill_triggers.name: Savage
skill_triggers.effect: When you use Martial Arts or Strike and score 3+ Hits, you may increase the Entropy by +2 to add +2 Bonus Hits to your result set.

skill_triggers.name: Relentless
skill_triggers.effect: When you Intimidate a target and score 3+ Hits, you may increase the Entropy by +1 to regain +2 Grit.

skill_triggers.name: Brutal
skill_triggers.effect: When you use Martial Arts, Strike, or Grapple a target and score 2+ Hits, you may spend 3 Momentum and 1 Entropy to have the target gain Confused 1.

skill_triggers.name: Practiced
skill_triggers.effect: When you Craft an Epic and score 0 Hits, add +2 Bonus Hits to the result set.

skill_triggers.name: Praiseworthy
skill_triggers.effect: When you Craft an Epic and score 5+ Hits, you may use your Shift this turn to activate the next Verse of the Epic as a Trigger.

skill_triggers.name: Handcrafted
skill_triggers.effect: When you Craft to restore Gear Ratings and score 0 Hits, add +2 Bonus Hits to the result set.

skill_triggers.name: Emotional
skill_triggers.effect: When you Craft an Epic with the Ballad keyword, add +1 Bonus Hit to the result set.

skill_triggers.name: Enrapturing
skill_triggers.effect: When you Craft an Epic with the Saga keyword, add +1 Bonus Hit to the result set.

skill_triggers.name: Meticulous
skill_triggers.effect: When you Craft to restore Gear ratings, score +1 Bonus Hits.

skill_triggers.name: Artisanal
skill_triggers.effect: When you Craft to create Concoctions and score 0 Hits, add +2 Bonus Hits to the result set.

skill_triggers.name: Skillful
skill_triggers.effect: When you Craft to create Concoctions, score +1 Bonus Hits.

skill_triggers.name: Fortified
skill_triggers.effect: When you Craft to create Concoctions and score 3+, reduce the number of turns required by -2.

skill_triggers.name: Restorative
skill_triggers.effect: When Strike a target and score 3+ Hits, you may restore +1 Gear Rating to your equipped weapon.

skill_triggers.name: Masterful
skill_triggers.effect: When you Craft, add +1 Bonus Hits to the result set.

skill_triggers.name: Ruinous
skill_triggers.effect: When you use a Destroy effect and score 0 Hits, add +2 Bonus Hits to the result.

skill_triggers.name: Cataclysmic
skill_triggers.effect: When you use a Destroy effect, score +1 Bonus Hits.

skill_triggers.name: Annihilating
skill_triggers.effect: When you score 4+ Hits with a Destroy effect, your target gains Vulnerable 1.

skill_triggers.name: Devastating
skill_triggers.effect: When you score 4+ Hits with a Destroy effect, your target gains Wounded 1.

skill_triggers.name: Savaging
skill_triggers.effect: When you score 4+ Hits with a Destroy effect that has a single target, you may score +1 Bonus Hits against a different target in the effect's Zone.

skill_triggers.name: Wrecking
skill_triggers.effect: When you use Martial Arts, Strike, or Grapple a target and score 3+ Hits, you may spend 1 Momentum and add +1d4 Bonus Hits to the result set.

skill_triggers.name: Indelible
skill_triggers.effect: When you Shoot or Thow at a target and score 3+ Hits, you may spend 1 Momentum and add +1d4 Bonus Hits to the result set.

skill_triggers.name: Appeasing
skill_triggers.effect: When you use a Destroy effect and score 3+ Hits, you may regain +1 Succor.

skill_triggers.name: Aligned
skill_triggers.effect: When you use a Destroy effect and score 3+ Hits, you may regain +1 Concordance.

skill_triggers.name: Mythical
skill_triggers.effect: When you use a Destroy effect and score 3+ Hits, you may reduce your Strain by -3.

skill_triggers.name: Igniting
skill_triggers.effect: When you score 4+ Hits with an Inferno effect, you create a Fire Hazard 1 in the targetted Zone until the flames are extinguished.

skill_triggers.name: Alluring
skill_triggers.effect: When you score 3+ Hits with an Inferno effect, you may have the target gain Charmed 1.

skill_triggers.name: Inextinguishable
skill_triggers.effect: When you use an Inferno effect and score 0 Hits, add +2 Bonus Hits to the result.

skill_triggers.name: Cleansing
skill_triggers.effect: When you score 4+ Hits with an Inferno effect, you may have reduce one Status of a target in the same zone as the effect by -1.

skill_triggers.name: Parching
skill_triggers.effect: When you score 4+ Hits with an Inferno effect, your target gains Fatigued 1.

skill_triggers.name: Unbridled
skill_triggers.effect: When you score 4+ Hits with an Inferno effect, all targets in the targetted Zone suffer the Hits.

skill_triggers.name: Scorching
skill_triggers.effect: When you score 4+ Hits with an Inferno effect, your target gains Vulnerable 1.

skill_triggers.name: Raging
skill_triggers.effect: When you use an Inferno effect, score +1 Bonus Hits.

skill_triggers.name: Sharpened
skill_triggers.effect: When you use an Intuit effect and score 0 Hits, add +2 Bonus Hits to the result.

skill_triggers.name: Prescient
skill_triggers.effect: When you use an Intuit effect, score +1 Bonus Hits.

skill_triggers.name: Astute
skill_triggers.effect: When you use Analyze, Insight, Investigate, Perceive, or Persuade and score 0 Hits, add +1d4 Bonus Hits to the result set.

skill_triggers.name: Keen
skill_triggers.effect: When you use a Savvy Skill and score 5+ Hits, you gain an additional Shift this turn.

skill_triggers.name: Discerning
skill_triggers.effect: When you use Insight or Persuade and score 2+ Hits, you may spend 1 Momentum and add +1d4 Bonus Hits to the result set.

skill_triggers.name: Honed
skill_triggers.effect: When you use Analyze or Perceive and score 2+ Hits, you may spend 1 Momentum and add +1d4 Bonus Hits to the result set.

skill_triggers.name: Positional
skill_triggers.effect: When you use a Locus effect and score 0 Hits, add +2 Bonus Hits to the result.

skill_triggers.name: Spatial
skill_triggers.effect: When you use a Locus effect, score +1 Bonus Hits.

skill_triggers.name: Axial
skill_triggers.effect: When you use a Shift to Defy Danger, add +1d4 Bonus Hits to the result set.

skill_triggers.name: Anchored
skill_triggers.effect: When you take an Action that targets something in an Adjacent Zone, you may spen 2 Momentum to target any Zone up to 2 Adjacencies from your Current Zone instead.

skill_triggers.name: Accelerated
skill_triggers.effect: When you take an Action that targets something in an Adjacent Zone, you may spend 2 Momentum to add +1d4 Bonus Hits to the result set.

skill_triggers.name: Vectorial
skill_triggers.effect: When you Shift to Move to an Adjacent Zone, you may spend 3 Momentum to immediately use another Shift.

skill_triggers.name: Serendipitous
skill_triggers.effect: When you use a Luck effect and score 0 Hits, add +2 Bonus Hits to the result.

skill_triggers.name: Lucky
skill_triggers.effect: When you use a Luck effect, score +1 Bonus Hits.

skill_triggers.name: Fortuitous
skill_triggers.effect: When you use an Action and score 0 Hits, you may spend 2 Momentum and reroll the result set.

skill_triggers.name: Favorable
skill_triggers.effect: When you roll a 1 on a Hazard die, you may reroll that Hazard, keeping the new result.

skill_triggers.name: Auspicious
skill_triggers.effect: When you use a Savvy skill and score 0 Hits, you may spend 1 Momentum and add +2 Bonus Hits to the result set.

skill_triggers.name: Opportune
skill_triggers.effect: When you use a Deft skill and score 0 Hits, you may spend 1 Momentum and add +2 Bonus Hits to the result set.

skill_triggers.name: Providential
skill_triggers.effect: When you use a Maneuver and fail, you may reroll the Maneuver, keeping the second result.

skill_triggers.name: Charmed
skill_triggers.effect: When you use an action and roll a 1 in the result set, you may spend a Trait Point to reroll the entire result set instead of only the 1.

skill_triggers.name: Fortunate
skill_triggers.effect: When you use a Shift to Defy Danger, add +1d4 Bonus Hits to the result set.

skill_triggers.name: Illuminating
skill_triggers.effect: When you score 3+ Hits with a Lux effect, one target in your Current Zone loses Blind.

skill_triggers.name: Unfading
skill_triggers.effect: When you use a Lux effect and score 0 Hits, add +2 Bonus Hits to the result.

skill_triggers.name: Blinding
skill_triggers.effect: When you score 4+ Hits with a Lux effect, your target gains Blind.

skill_triggers.name: Lustrous
skill_triggers.effect: When you use a Lux effect, score +1 Bonus Hits.

skill_triggers.name: Exposing
skill_triggers.effect: When you score 4+ Hits with a Lux effect, you may have the all target's in the effect's Zone lose the Invisible keyword.

skill_triggers.name: Revealing
skill_triggers.effect: When you score 3+ Hits with a Lux effect, you may reduce the Hidden ratings of all targets in the effect's Zone by 3.

skill_triggers.name: Restorative
skill_triggers.effect: When you score 2+ Hits with a Medicine effect that reduces one target's Status, reduce that Status by an additional -1.

skill_triggers.name: Curative
skill_triggers.effect: When you use a Medicine effect, score +1 Bonus Hits.

skill_triggers.name: Nurturing
skill_triggers.effect: When you use a Medicine effect and score 0 Hits, add +2 Bonus Hits to the result set.

skill_triggers.name: Therapeutic
skill_triggers.effect: When you use a Medicine effect to recover one target's Defenses, you may have that target regain +1 Grit.

skill_triggers.name: Revitalizing
skill_triggers.effect: When you us a Medicine effect on one target and score 2+ Hits, you may reduce the target's Dying Rating by -1.

skill_triggers.name: Cognitive
skill_triggers.effect: When you use a Mentis effect and score 0 Hits, add +2 Bonus Hits to the result.

skill_triggers.name: Psychic
skill_triggers.effect: When you use a Mentis effect, score +1 Bonus Hits.

skill_triggers.name: Telepathic
skill_triggers.effect: When you score 4+ Hits with a Mentis effect, your target gains Confused 1.

skill_triggers.name: Death Dealer
skill_triggers.effect: When you use a Mori effect and score 0 Hits, add +2 Bonus Hits to the result.

skill_triggers.name: Death Monger
skill_triggers.effect: When you use a Mori effect, score +1 Bonus Hits.

skill_triggers.name: Deathly Respite
skill_triggers.effect: When you score 5+ Hits with a Mori effect, you may reduce your Dying rating by -1.

skill_triggers.name: Death's Trace
skill_triggers.effect: When you score 4+ Hits with a Mori effect, your target gains Wounded 1.

skill_triggers.name: Death's Mark
skill_triggers.effect: When you score 4+ Hits with a Mori effect, your target gains Vulnerable 1.

skill_triggers.name: Death's Presence
skill_triggers.effect: When you score 3+ Hits with a Mori effect, you may have one target in the effect's Zone gain Vulnerable 1.

skill_triggers.name: Voidic
skill_triggers.effect: When you use a Nihil effect and score 0 Hits, add +2 Bonus Hits to the result.

skill_triggers.name: Abyssal
skill_triggers.effect: When you use a Nihil effect, score +1 Bonus Hits.

skill_triggers.name: Nullifying
skill_triggers.effect: When you score 4+ Hits with a Nihil effect, your target gains Confused 1.

skill_triggers.name: Obliterating
skill_triggers.effect: When you score 3+ Hits with a Nihil effect, your target gains Afraid 2.

skill_triggers.name: Desolating
skill_triggers.effect: When you score 4+ Hits with a Nihil effect, your target gains Blind 1.

skill_triggers.name: Shadowy
skill_triggers.effect: When you use a Nox effect and score 0 Hits, add +2 Bonus Hits to the result.

skill_triggers.name: Umbral
skill_triggers.effect: When you use a Nox effect, score +1 Bonus Hits.

skill_triggers.name: Enshrouding
skill_triggers.effect: When you score 4+ Hits with a Nox effect, you may gain Hidden 2.
When you use a Phylla effect and score 0 Hits, add +2 Bonus Hits to the result.

skill_triggers.name: Verdant
skill_triggers.effect: When you use a Phylla effect, score +1 Bonus Hits.

skill_triggers.name: Stalwart
skill_triggers.effect: When you use a Resist effect and score 0 Hits, add +2 Bonus Hits to the result.

skill_triggers.name: Unyielding
skill_triggers.effect: When you use a Resist effect, score +1 Bonus Hits.

skill_triggers.name: Immovable
skill_triggers.effect: When you use the Recover Action and score 3+ Hits, you may reduce one Status by -1.

skill_triggers.name: Ironclad
skill_triggers.effect: When you roll a 1 on a Hazard die, you may reroll that Hazard, keeping the new result.

skill_triggers.name: Resilient
skill_triggers.effect: When you suffer 4+ Hits from an effect, reduce the total Hits by -1.

skill_triggers.name: Fortified
skill_triggers.effect: When have the Wounded Status, you may use the Recover Action to reduce your Wounded rating by -1 instead of recovering Defenses or regaining Grit.

skill_triggers.name: Frigid
skill_triggers.effect: When you use a Rime effect and score 0 Hits, add +2 Bonus Hits to the result.

skill_triggers.name: Icy
skill_triggers.effect: When you use a Rime effect, score +1 Bonus Hits.

skill_triggers.name: Glacial
skill_triggers.effect: When you use a Rime effect and score 3+ Hits, you may have the target gain Frozen 2.

skill_triggers.name: Sanguine
skill_triggers.effect: When you use a Sangui effect and score 0 Hits, add +2 Bonus Hits to the result.

skill_triggers.name: Vital
skill_triggers.effect: When you use a Sangui effect, score +1 Bonus Hits.

skill_triggers.name: Gusting
skill_triggers.effect: When you use a Squall effect and score 0 Hits, add +2 Bonus Hits to the result.

skill_triggers.name: Tempestuous
skill_triggers.effect: When you use a Squall effect, score +1 Bonus Hits.

skill_triggers.name: Unyielding
skill_triggers.effect: When you use a Tellus effect and score 0 Hits, add +2 Bonus Hits to the result.

skill_triggers.name: Overwhelming
skill_triggers.effect: When you use a Tellus effect, score +1 Bonus Hits.

skill_triggers.name: Metamorphic
skill_triggers.effect: When you use a Tellus effect and score 3+ Hits, you may have the effect's target gain Slowed 1.

skill_triggers.name: Pummeling
skill_triggers.effect: When you use a Tellus effect and score 4+ Hits, you may have the effect's target become Prone.

skill_triggers.name: Grounding
skill_triggers.effect: When you use a Tellus effect and score 3+ Hits, you may reduce one Status rating of one ally in the effect's Zone by -1.

skill_triggers.name: Hardening
skill_triggers.effect: When you use a Tellus effect and score 3+ Hits, you gain Armor Defense +1.

skill_triggers.name: Refining
skill_triggers.effect: When you score 3+ Hits with a Tellus effect, you may remove 1 Hazard in the effect's Zone.

skill_triggers.name: Obstructive
skill_triggers.effect: When you score 4+ Hits with a Tellus effect, you may create +1 Hazard in the effect's Zone.

skill_triggers.name: Inescapable
skill_triggers.effect: When you use a Tempest effect and score 0 Hits, add +2 Bonus Hits to the result.

skill_triggers.name: Raging
skill_triggers.effect: When you use a Tempest effect, score +1 Bonus Hits.

skill_triggers.name: Startling
skill_triggers.effect: When you use a Tempest effect and score 3+ Hits, you may have the target gain Dazed 1.

skill_triggers.name: Staggering
skill_triggers.effect: When you use a Tempest effect and score 4+ Hits, you may have the target gain Stunned 3.

skill_triggers.name: Shocking
skill_triggers.effect: When you use a Tempest effect and score 4+ Hits, you may have the target gain Stunned 1.

skill_triggers.name: Energizing
skill_triggers.effect: When you use a Tempest effect and score 4+ Hits, you gain +2 Current.

skill_triggers.name: Ritualistic
skill_triggers.effect: When you use a Tempest effect and score 3+ Hits, you gain +1 Concordance.

skill_triggers.name: Surging
skill_triggers.effect: When you use a Tempest effect and score 3+ Hits, you gain +1 Current.

skill_triggers.name: Eternal
skill_triggers.effect: When you use a Tempor effect and score 3+ Hits, you may reduce one of your Statuses by -1.

skill_triggers.name: Chronal
skill_triggers.effect: When you use a Tempor effect and score 3+ Hits, you may have one target gain Slowed 1.

skill_triggers.name: Timeless
skill_triggers.effect: When you use a Tempor effect, score +1 Bonus Hits.

skill_triggers.name: Epochal
skill_triggers.effect: When you use a Tempor effect and score 0 Hits, add +2 Bonus Hits to the result.

skill_triggers.name: Fleeting
skill_triggers.effect: When you use a Tempor effect and score 3+ Hits, you may increase the current Timer by +1.

skill_triggers.name: Rapid
skill_triggers.effect: When you use a Tempor effect and score 3+ Hits, you may take an addition Shift this turn.

skill_triggers.name: Momentous
skill_triggers.effect: When you use a Tempor effect and score 3+ Hits, your team maintains the Initiative even if there is a 1 in your result set.

skill_triggers.name: Surging
skill_triggers.effect: When you use a Torrent effect and score 0 Hits, add +2 Bonus Hits to the result.

skill_triggers.name: Cascading
skill_triggers.effect: When you use a Torrent effect, score +1 Bonus Hits.

skill_triggers.name: Vital
skill_triggers.effect: When you use an Vivus effect and score 0 Hits, add +2 Bonus Hits to the result.

skill_triggers.name: Invigorating
skill_triggers.effect: When you use an Vivus effect, score +1 Bonus Hits.
